answers.answer: my mom took lyrica and oxycotin 25mg for part of the pain as well as frequent warm bathes. Good luck
Agreed. Lyrica and some level of pain medication can help. The warm baths or hot tubs work well also.

If another condition, such as diabetes, is involved, better management of that disorder may alleviate the pain.In some cases, the use of Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation (TENS) on the nerves involve may significantly control the pain symptoms.

question: what can you do for neuropathy pain?
title: neuropathy
